item.title: Trump Continues Attacks on Judiciary
item.description: President Donald Trump used his Truth Social account to levy more attacks on the judiciary Friday.

item.title: Axios: Musk PAC Offers Wisconsin Voters $100
item.description: An Elon Musk super PAC is offering Wisconsin voters $100 to sign a petition expressing their opposition to "activist judges," it was reported.
